Daily Riddle for Past tense and Hole diggingDaily Riddle Todays Riddle is Today we have two riddles again What common English verb becomes its own past tense by rearranging its letters If it takes a man one hour to dig a hole two meters long two meters wide and two meters deep how long would it take the same man to dig a hole four meters long four meters wide and four meters deep assuming he digs at the same rate of speed As always you will find the answer below todays sponsor Please take a moment and visit todays sponsor Get a full days worth of humor in one email Jokes Toons Great Links everyday and free A HREFmailtoBuffalosGJokessubs A Clean A HREFmailtolynnlynnslinkssubscr A Links Only Or Visit us at A HREFA The answer to todays Riddle is Answer Eat becomes Ate Eight hours It takes twice as long to double the length twice as long to double the width and twice as long to double the depth To find cubic measurement you multiply length x width x height therefore on the first hole one hour equals m x m x m or cubic meters On the second hole the formula is m x x m or cubic meters You are currently subscribed to riddles as To unsubscribe send a blank email to

Daily Riddle for KidnappedDaily Riddle Todays Riddle is A rich mans son was kidnapped The ransom note told him to bring a valuable diamond to a phone booth in the middle of a public park Plainclothes police officers surrounded the park intending to follow the criminal or his messenger The rich man arrived at the phone booth and followed instructions but the police were powerless to prevent the diamond from leaving the park and reaching the crafty villain What did he do As always you will find the answer below todays sponsor Please take a moment and visit todays sponsor AMAZING WEIGHT LOSS Lose those unwanted inches and pounds start now and be a better you for the swimsuit summer ahead GO TO a hreftraceaspnameriddleswwwaaaopportunity comtraceaspnameriddlesa Losing weight is easy if you have this system get it today at a hreftraceaspnameriddleswwwaaaopportunity comtraceaspnameriddlesa The answer to todays Riddle is This is a true story from Taiwan When the rich man reached the phone booth he found a carrier pigeon in a cage It had a message attached telling the man to put the diamond in a small bag which was around the pigeons neck and to release the bird When the man did this the police were powerless to follow the bird as it returned across the city to its owner You are currently subscribed to riddles as To unsubscribe send a blank email to
